title: My Sweet Audrina / If There be Thorns / Petals on the Wind / Flowers in the Attic
description: A mystery thriller from the author V.C.Andrews. What is the secret everyoneknows except Audrina? What is thesecret of the room containing only arocking chair? This is a story of deceit, betrayal, and terrible familysecrets.
author: V.C. Andrews
